com.datasift.client.managedsource.sources

Interface DataSource<T extends DataSource<T>>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseSource, FacebookPage, GooglePlus, Instagram, Yammer

    public interface DataSource<T extends DataSource<T>>
    Author:
    Courtney Robinson

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAuthAsJSON() 
      String getParametersAsJSON() 
      String getResourcesAsJSON() 
      boolean hasAuth() 
      boolean hasParams() 
      boolean hasResources() 
      ManagedDataSourceType<T> type() 

    • Method Detail

      • getResourcesAsJSON

        String getResourcesAsJSON()
        Returns:
        A URL encoded string which represents the resources for this data source note this is the value for the "resources" field and does not include the key itself

      • getAuthAsJSON

        String getAuthAsJSON()
        Returns:
        A URL encoded string which represents the auth information for this data source note this is the value for the "auth" field and does not include the key itself

      • getParametersAsJSON

        String getParametersAsJSON()
        Returns:
        A URL encoded string which represents the parameters for this data source note this is the value for the "parameters" field and does not include the key itself

      • type

        ManagedDataSourceType<T> type()
        Returns:
        a managed source type of the data source this represents

      • hasAuth

        boolean hasAuth()
        Returns:
        true if any auth information has been set for this data source

      • hasResources

        boolean hasResources()
        Returns:
        true if any resource parameters have been configured for this data source

      • hasParams

        boolean hasParams()
        Returns:
        true if any "parameter" params have been configured for this data source
